title: Heptagons
content: [](http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/1134/545/1600/gardnersm.jpg)From a masterfully done invitation to G4G7, the 7th annual Gathering for Martin Gardner, master puzzler and keeper of the mathematical archives. I am honored by this invitation.I'm also a fan of Gerald Gardner, cofounder of Wicca, a designer religion for which many Quakers of my ilk have developed a special fondness. See [Triumph of the Moon](http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0192854496/qid=1134928404/) for more info.
author: Kirby Urner
